comments.desc: Reset the canvas states to the default states.
Check whether any vertex has been pushed in the rendering buffer.
Set the default color A of the canvas. (default is 0xFFFFFFFF - white)

Set whether line have a constant size in screen space.

remark.text: Begin reset the default size to 1.
Sets the default blit material when apMaterial is NULL.

comments.desc: Sets the default material as current material and sets its texture, blendmode and sampler states.

remark.text: Billboard mode influence the next rectangle/frame pushed.
If the billboard right and up vectors haven't been set they will be derived from the current the view matrix.
If not set explicitly, the first SetBillboard(true) after Begin sets it to the current camera view matrix's right vector.
If not set explicitly, the first SetBillboard(true) after Begin sets it to the current camera view matrix's up vector.
